about_the_game:
Bunny Bunker is a small game where your objective is to build a Bunny colony that is strong enough to send bunnies into space, in order to escape the ever growing hordes that attack your Bunny Colony. Bunny bunker is a mix of City Builder and Tower defence.

  • Build a colony with a infrastructure to support your Bunny population
  • Harvest resrouces, Wood, Rocks and Carrots, to build buildings and prevent the Bunnies from starving
  • Setup defences and walls to make sure that you can survive the nights
  • Create Warriror bunnies to operate towers and fight the monsters, while the worker bunnies are hiding in the bunker.
  • Defend your colony during the nights where waves of enemies try to destroy your colony and eat your bunnies.

Story

In the green fields of Bunnyland, a thriving community of bunnies once lived under the warm sun. Their burrows were filled with laughter and life.

But darkness crept over their idyllic world, and night creatures emerged from the shadows, laying waste to everything in their path.

The bunnies scattered, their once wonderful community reduced to ruins, building new smaller colonies. Hope was never lost within the hearts of the bunnies. They gazed up at the stars, dreaming of a new beginning beyond the reach of the night creatures' tyranny. With determination in their hearts, the bunnies pooled their knowledge and resources, embarking on a daring mission. They worked tirelessly, constructing a magnificent space rocket fueled by their courage.

As the night creatures continued to spread their darkness, the bunnies made their final preparations. With a mighty roar, the first colony rocket rocket ignited, piercing through the atmosphere and carrying the courageous bunnies towards the endless expanse of space.

As they soared among the stars, leaving their troubled past behind, a sense of hope and possibility filled their hearts. For the bunnies knew that wherever their journey led, they would always carry the light of resilience and unity within them. You have been given the task to help the remaning Bunny colonies to build their own rockets and go into space.

name: Bunny Bunker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Window 8+
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • VR Support: No
